privacyPolicy.section2_1_3: Sending you updates, newsletters and promotional materials;

storeRefundPolicy.title: Game Store Refund Policy
storeRefundPolicy.introduction: We strive to provide our customers with the best products and services. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, please review our refund policy to understand how you can get a refund.
storeRefundPolicy.section1_1: This Refund Policy regulates the process of returning and refunding money for purchases made in our game store (hereinafter - "Store").
storeRefundPolicy.section1_2: The policy applies to all Store customers.
storeRefundPolicy.section2_1: You may return physical products purchased in the Store within [30] days of purchase, provided that the products are in original packaging and have not been used.
storeRefundPolicy.section2_2: For digital products (e.g., game keys, digital downloads), return and refund is possible only if the product has not been activated or downloaded.
storeRefundPolicy.section3_1: To initiate a return, contact our customer support through [specify contact method: email, phone, website form].
storeRefundPolicy.section3_2: After receiving your request, we will provide you with instructions for returning the product.
storeRefundPolicy.section3_3: You are responsible for the cost of returning the product unless otherwise stated in our Policy.
storeRefundPolicy.section4_1: After receiving and verifying the returned product, we will send you a notification about the status of your return.
storeRefundPolicy.section4_2: If the return is approved, we will process your refund within [10] business days. The refund will be made using the same method used for the original payment.
storeRefundPolicy.section5_1: We will refund the full cost of the product, excluding shipping costs, if the product was not defective.
storeRefundPolicy.section5_2: If the product was returned due to a defect or error on our part, we will also reimburse shipping costs.
storeRefundPolicy.section6_1: Some products are not eligible for return, including, but not limited to, the following:
storeRefundPolicy.section6_1_4: Products that show obvious signs of use or damage caused by the customer.
storeRefundPolicy.section7_1: We offer product exchange only in case the product turned out to be defective or was sent by mistake. To exchange, contact our customer support.
storeRefundPolicy.section8_1: If you have any questions or comments regarding this Refund Policy, please contact us using the contact information provided on our website.
storeRefundPolicy.closing1: Thank you for your purchases in our Slush!
storeRefundPolicy.closing2: We value your trust and strive to provide you with satisfaction from our products and services.
